trans-unit.source: A class implementing this interface notifies you when an object is being disposed.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类可在释放对象时通知你。

trans-unit.source: When object is being disposed, it can be used to perform clean up tasks such as unsubscribing from event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 当释放对象时，它可以用于执行清理任务，例如取消订阅事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is being disposed.
The handler for this event can be used to unsubscribe from events and release any references or resources.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的处理程序可以用于取消订阅事件并释放任何引用或资源。

trans-unit.source: Most properties are still accessible in the handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 大多数属性是此事件的处理程序中仍可访问。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposing> complements the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposed.Disposed> event where accessing any object member will cause an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposing> 进行了补充<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposed.Disposed>事件将导致访问任何对象成员<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether an object is disposing.
<see langword="True" /> if the object is disposing; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果正在释放对象;<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to check this property even after object is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 则可以安全地释放对象后，即使检查此属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposing.IsDisposing%2A> remains `true` after the object is disposed.
If the class implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> then the `PropertyChanged` event will be raised for this property when object starts the dispose process.
trans-unit.target: 如果类实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>则`PropertyChanged`对象启动释放过程时，将此属性引发事件。
